Malice:
 
"Sure, a workout wouldn't hurt.  A chance to test the full extent of my powers."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"Yes he's"said with a wide smile"How do you feel, Malice??? enough 
good to a little training?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> Malice continued to chow down, until every cube was devoured.  
Satisfied, the T- Rex licked it's chops and turned to 
Blacknightmare.  He transformed back into robot mode and stood on 
his own.  He examined his hands, smiled, and stood close to 
Blacknightmare.
> "Thanks to you two, I am better than ever!  I owe my life to you, 
my Masters."
>  
> Hellplague was delighted with her appearent success.  Malice had 
made a full recovery, and her programming was working flawlessly.  
She walked over and leaned on the male's shoulder and traced the 
underside of his chin with her index finger.
> "He's marvelous, isn't he, sister?  Our little pet..." 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> �The femme moved and when she was behind Malice said"So, my dear, 
> how do you feel?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Malice/ Splattercannon:
> >  
> > Hellplague was puzzeled with Blacknightmare's expression, but 
> dismissed it and returned her attention to Malice.
> >  
> > The T- Rex continued feeding on the energon.  With every crunch, 
> his power supply grew.  Soon his power would be at it's ultimate, 
> and he would destroy...
> >  
> > Splattercannon transformed and got out of the pile of energon 
> cubes.  He remained and watched the spectical.
>
